Text: Re DEFSEnron Letter Agreement Cc Attached you will find minor revisions to these agreements marked in red CIPCO is now an LLC so we have reflected it that way in the agreement We also filled in information for the blanks Otherwise everything looks great Also for your information Brian S Frederick Vice President will sign the letter and escrow agreement for CIPCO CIPCOs tax ID is I filled in the contact information for the Escrow Agreement Let me know if you have any questions Thanks See attached file Centana Letter AgreementRevDOCSee attached file ESCROW AGREEMENTREVDOC Proctor Shemin V To kll pcom cc Subject Attached Files AM Gentlemen Attached are the final drafts of the Letter Agreement and Escrow Agreement Please contact me if you have any questions or comments Regards Shemin Centana Letter AgreementDOC ESCROW AGREEMENTDOC See attached file Centana Letter AgreementDOCSee attached file ESCROW AGREEMENTDOC
